ygData.subject: Re: Arrrgh! I've had it!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... thats funny.  i dont get a white con, but black is in the order of where you have white.  do you use direct 3d?  i guess it could be the video settings.
ygData.messageBody:
> Sorry, black con? I don't think I've ever seen one of those. What
>does that mean? The only things I've seen were
>
> Green, green risky, blue, blue risky, white, yellow, red.
>
>I've never seen a black con I don't think.

thats funny. i dont get a white con, but black is in the order of where you
have white. do you use direct 3d? i guess it could be the video settings.
